title: "France passes a law that lets museums put back art that the Nazis stole"
excerpt: "France has passed a new law allowing museums to return stolen art from the Nazis. The new heritage code covers cultural items stolen between 1933 and 1945. President Macron has made restitution and repatriation a top goal."
